text: Robert Lever Howarth (31 July 1927 – 2 April 2021) was a British politician. He was a Member of Parliament (MP) for Bolton East from 1964 to 1970. Howarth died in April 2021 at the age of 93, after suffering from dementia.Tributes to former MP and council leader who was last surviving ‘freeman’ of Bolton ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:Deaths from dementia Category:UK MPs 1964–1966 Category:UK MPs 1966–1970
title: Robert Howarth
